name: Brain Crush
description:
Brain Crush is a mind, “strategy”, and fast thinking game in a world of 2D.
Basically, the biggest goal of the game is to reach a blue portal looking a lot like the main character. The game might improve your real life reflexes and logic thinking as well.







The 2 campaigns offer a gameplay of 30 to 60 minutes each for a player playing the game for the first time (and without any tutorials watched).
Some players might complete the Nightmare levels in 30 minutes, others in 4 hours or more…

In Brain Crush Classic you will encounter 5 tool blocks which will or will not help you reach your goal:


Balls - Fire - Laser - ? - Spikes

In Tech Crush you will be playing as 2 characters: 1 & 2. But only one character can be played at a time.

Pressing ESC or BACKSPACE will let you quit the game, so will the red X in your window. The only difference is that the red X won't let you say no to quitting the game!






In case you do not see any images with game information on, please read this:

"2 campaigns with 10 unique levels each!
3 hidden Nightmare levels!
3 minigame levels!

Lots of Easter eggs!
A hidden storyline!
Unknown amount of secret rooms!

Brain Crush is built up in a way that new campaigns and secrets always can be added to the game.
That means that the game will keep evolving based on community interest!

WARNING!
Brain Crush can cause a lot of frustration.
It is advised to take breaks from the game once in a while.
If you keep getting stuck on a level, it is also highly recommended that you play the training campaigns!"
